Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: True Flip‚Äôs provably fair crypto lottery is back with new features, enhanced tech  Widely re-worked for uncompromised stability, and keeping its remarkable fairness check feature, Flip‚Äôs Star will participate in the evolving loyalty program at the company‚Äôs playground, Trueflip.io, while a b2b version arrives later this year.   The next incarnation of Flip‚Äôs Star is built around its progressive Jackpot, worth 50 BTC on launch. Given its friendly interface and authentic visuals, the game appeals with simplicity, uncommon for blockchain apps - pick 5 numbers in the main field and then a Star number.  Flip‚Äôs Star has acquired a key role in the loyalty system at Trueflip.io. A meta-game, it will grant tickets for points earned while playing other games on the platform. Also, tickets will be up for sale, priced in BTC and TFL, with bulk discounts up to 75%.  Draws will take place every Sunday around 18:00 UTC, when a genuine algorithm by True Flip extracts a winning sequence from a newly-generated, thus unpredictable, Bitcoin block hash. The concept enables a one-click fairness check on the site.  ‚ÄúFlip‚Äôs Star has ensured our successful business launch, and passed 590 daily draws, bringing lots of joy to numerous lucky players. After months of refactoring, the game is back in service, massively updated in core, with more features and a whole new role in our ecosystem.‚Äù ‚Äì said Konstantin Katsev, CMO of True Flip.  Meanwhile, the game is being prepared to enrich True Flip‚Äôs b2b offer in late 2019, with additional value brought by a cross-platform Jackpot.  True Flip has also withdrawn another blockchain-utilizing lottery, Rapid to the Moon, to face similar updates. The instant drawing game will return to the company‚Äôs b2b and b2c portfolios before the end of the year.  Flip‚Äôs Star is available to registered players at: https://star.trueflip.io/.

Body: Flip‚Äôs Star redevelopment starting 26/9/2018  Flip‚Äôs Star was launched over a year ago to become the completely transparent, blockchain-based number game. Since then Trueflip.io has undergone thousands of updates ‚Äî from deep tech to user interface. We launched 5 games, and there are more to come in 2019.  Eventually we‚Äôve noticed a large gap between the platform and our first game. The user interest is rather low today when compared to other True Flip products. It seems, that our first born now needs a massive upgrade.  Therefore, after 590 days in operation, Flip‚Äôs Star will take a timeout ‚Äî for a complete refactoring and maths update. All purchased unplayed Flip‚Äôs Star tickets will be refunded (x2) to users‚Äô balances.  The last draw will take place on Wednesday, 26.09.  By December we‚Äôll come up with the plans for developing and restarting the game. Meanwhile the Jackpot funds will be stored securely and publicly at this permanent address: https://www.blockchain.com/btc/address/1FmQr2LMFQCp74Csyzbhq4JqzMDG7uMMnj. Body: [MASTER FLIP‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäNEXT DRAW ON 07/16‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäGET READY!]  Dear friends!  Another Master Flip draw, the game for TFL holders, is coming soon ‚Äì July 16! For every 100 TFL you own, you‚Äôll receive a Flip Coupon to participate. The prize fund amounts to a whopping 9.8 BTC!   Just park the tokens between 10:00 UTC, July 9, and 15:00 UTC, July 16, complete a survey, and fill in your ticket.  To participate please use the instructions below:  Step 1. Park your TFL Tokens before 15:00 UTC on July 16th. ¬∑         Log into your account on Trueflip.io ¬∑         Choose "TFL token" on the left sidebar ¬∑         Find the blue tab in Dashboard and click "Park more" ¬∑         Use the indicated address to transfer TFL from your wallet Step 2. Take part in the Survey. ¬∑         Choose ‚ÄúMaster Flip‚Äù in the sidebar. You will have to complete a survey prior to the beginning of the game. Please share your thoughts on True Flip development in 2018 Step 4. Fill a ticket in ‚ÄúMaster Flip‚Äù before 18:00 UTC on July 16th. ¬∑         Read all rules carefully. Confirm your decision ¬∑         Add the tickets, choose the bet, and wait for the results Step 5. Get your reward on July 16th after 19:00 UTC. ¬∑         Visit Trueflip.io on July 16th after 19:00 UTC ¬∑         Check the draw results and claim your reward!   Best of Luck and Enjoy the Game!   Yours, TF team

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: True Flip enters the slot market with Chain‚Äôs Code  True Flip has developed and launched its first slot game. Chain‚Äôs Code is available now at cc.trueflip.io with bets starting at 0.000020 BTC and up to 5 BTC as the Superprize.  3rd April 2018 ‚Äì Costa Rica Chain‚Äôs Code features a single-line slot machine with a centralized play button for speed, ease of use and substantial replayability. Draws take place every 10-15 seconds, making Chain‚Äôs Code the fastest game from True Flip so far.  Based on a provably fair blockchain solution, Chain‚Äôs Code has a built-in multiplier which exponentially increases the possible win.  Six major cryptocurrencies are accepted. All payouts are in Bitcoin.  ‚ÄúWith its fast and captivating gameplay, these so-called 'slot games‚Äô are among the most widely-adopted iGaming products across the globe. Our decision to develop our own slot machine follows our long-term strategy of acquiring additional markets through the reinterpretation of admired, classic games. We expect Chain‚Äôs Code to become the strongest competitor to similar top-tier products and to bring new players to Trueflip.io‚Äù - CMO Konstantin Katsev.  ‚ÄúTrue Flip started as a popular single game with daily draws and a huge jackpot. Based on our comprehensive analyses, we‚Äôve been developing new games to provide a different experience to our players. Chain‚Äôs Code is perfect both in terms of appearance and gameplay: it‚Äôs smart and simple, but endearingly cute. This product meets the highest standards our users and partners could ever imagine‚Äù - COO Nikita Parkhomenko.  About True Flip  True Flip is a blockchain fair games platform, drawing from the advantages of distributed ledger technology. These include overall transparency of processes such as random number generation, ticket purchases, prize distribution, and our innovative approach to the financial aspects of iGaming.  True Flip has released three games, with more in development, and has presently attracted more than 170,000 registered players. As a result of its successful crowdsale in July 2017, the current Jackpot is a massive 400 BTC which keeps growing with every ticket sold. The platform offers self-developed customer products available on trueflip.io and a range of B2B solutions for iGaming operators, affiliates and integrators.  https://t.me/truefliplotto  https://t.me/joinchat/AAAAAELcwT-fgH2zG7xEng  https://www.facebook.com/TrueFlip.io/  https://twitter.com/TrueFlipLoto  https://medium.com/@trueflip/  https://www.reddit.com/r/trueflip/  https://github.com/trueflip

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: TFL holders special game ‚Äì APRIL 10, 2018   Dear TFL holders,  It‚Äôs unbelievable, but another 3 months have passed in a blink of an eye Therefore Master Flip ‚Äì our special token holder game ‚Äì is on its way!  The draw will take place at 18:00 UTC, April 10. The current Prize fund amounts to 16 BTC - to be distributed among TFL holders in a fair and transparent way.  Here‚Äôs a post-release on the previous draw in Q4, 2017 - https://steemit.com/crypto-news/@trueflip/holiday-greetings-master-flip-results-hny-2018  To participate please use the following instructions:  Step 1. Park TFL Tokens before 15:00 UTC, April 10.  - Log in to your existing account on Trueflip.io, or sign up a new one; - Choose "TFL token" on the left sidebar; - Find the blue tab in Dashboard and click "Park more"; - Use the indicated address to transfer TFL from your wallet.  Step 2. Make sure you‚Äôve got Flip Coupons for the parked TFL.  - Flip Coupons allocation starts on April 2; - Flip Coupons are distributed automatically since a user parked the belonging TFL; - We award a Flip Coupon per every 100 TFL you own; - Your Flip Coupons will appear on Trueflip.io, right next to the Balance.  Step 3. Take part in the Survey.  Choose ‚ÄúMaster Flip‚Äù in the sidebar. You'll have to complete a survey prior to the game start. Please share your thoughts on True Flip development in 2018.  Step 4.** Fill a ticket in ‚ÄúMaster Flip‚Äù before 18:00 UTC, April 10. Read the rules carefully, make your choice and confirm it.  Step 5. Get your Reward on April 11.  Visit Trueflip.io on April 11, check the draw results and get your rewards. Enjoy the game and Good luck!  Yours, TF team

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello,  Our new "Flip's Wiki" post is devoted to one of the most valuable features of True Flip - checking the games' fairness.  For centuries gaming hasn't been changing: the players needed to trust the operators, with very limited options to ensure a game is really fair. That's the key reason the industry nowadays faces an overall lack of trust. True Flip has an opposite approach in its very core: we use blockchain to make all related processes transparent and easily verifiable.  Step 1. Sign in (18+) and click the upper left button with 3 stripes for the menu.  Step 2. Choose "Draw archive" for the desired game and find the draw you want to examine.  Step 3. Click on the draw - a pop-up window will open, indicating the block hash that provided the winning numbers (coloured orange). Copy the hash.  Step 4. Go back to main menu, choose "Check the transparency". Paste the copied hash in the arriving pop-up, then hit "Check now". Voila! The draw's winning numbers will be indicated.  NEW! We've updated this solution in "Rapid to the moon" - now it shows a detailed breakdown of the random numbers generation for any exact draw chosen. That's what we call "fairness, explained"  Step 4a. To ensure that the copied hash was trustworthy visit blockchain.info, the official 3rd party for all Bitcoin-related matters. There you can easily search with the given hash to find the exact block providing us with the winning numbers.  Step 4b. For those with a knowledge in coding or tech savvy friends, there is an open source code of the algorithm on Github, - you can analyse it as well.  Enjoy the fair gaming and, of course, Good luck!  https://steemit.com/crypto-news/@trueflip/checking-the-games-fairness-on-trueflip-io  Best wishes, TF Team

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Dear ilvbtc,  We have carefully examined your issue once again.  As stated before, you didn't ever gain (with our referral system or otherwise) the funds you are claiming for, except those you have successfully withdrawn to a personal wallet.  As our support clearly explained in response to your request, there has been a minor front-end issue resulting in an incorrect balance indication for separate users. We've been informed of the issue quite promptly, so it had been fixed shortly. Anyhow, the bug did NEVER affect any processes except the user balance indication in several cases.  You've been the only user to claim for the funds withdrawal instead of reporting a bug.  As for the referral system, either this could never be a source for obtaining 5 Bitcoins you claim to own - given the stats both we and you see in the regarding section of your user account. These include 493 registrations by your referral link, with 174 using their free tickets upon registration and SEVEN playing for self-deposited funds.  The referral system has been launched in a very beginning of True Flip as a simple yet effective solution for our promo goals. It provides you with 10% of the referrals' ticket purchases AND 15% of their wins - as an extra motivation for our supporters.  A simple calculation shows that the above mentioned referrals had brought you almost exactly the amount of funds you've later withdrawn. Thus we'd kindly ask that you double-check own calculations before developing any accusations towards True Flip.  As well, we'd kindly note that all available legal means will be implemented immediately as a result of any intentional efforts to harm this company's business reputation. In case we're forced to oppose further to any disturbing inquiries, we save the right to publish an entire story of communication related to this issue -  as a clear evidence on the real state of things.  Thank you!  Best wishes, TF Team

Body: [True Flip expanding to Asia! -- iGA 2018, Macau]  Dear friends,  We're pleased to inform, that True Flip is attending the 10th iGaming Asia Congress - the longest running C-level iGaming event in Asia - on 13-15 March 2018 in Grand Hyatt, Macau.  iGA brings together operators, affiliates, suppliers and other companies from regional and global industry, which means great B2B opportunities for us! More info here: https://igamingasiacongress.com/  Why do we need this? At least, for several reasons:  The igaming revenues in Asian markets keep growing year-to-year; Macau is the region's igaming capital, rapidly evolving as a global business hub; Number games are traditionally popular and well adopted in the local culture; Around 30% of our existing traffic comes from Asia. This year iGA holds the first Innovation Start-up Launchpad, which True Flip is proud to sponsor. New projects are like a breath of fresh air in the industry, and it's a pleasure for us to lead and support this evolving market.  True Flip takes part in multiple speaking sessions, showcasing our expertise and products in front of the most influential local igaming vendors. As a result, we prepare for a significant rise in the presence and awareness of True Flip on numerous appealing markets across the region.  As always, we'll be happy to meet everyone interested on site for a short talk or a long discussion See you, and stay tuned for the news on True Flip!   Best wishes, TF Team

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: True Flip on ICE 2018    Hi there,  This week's been marked with a short trip to London, where ICE Totally Gaming event took place. The above picture shows our team members - exhausted though positive - in the very end of this days-long sprint Firstly, thanks to all those who found our tiny booth (though the biggest we had so far) between monstrous neighbour constructions! It's really awesome to meet more supporters and have a chat in person. As always, your positive feedback's our #1 driver! And thanks for sharing thoughts and advise, as they really help us go better.  True Flip's "social network" grows day by day, involving more friends, partners and enthusiasts globally, which affects our workflow in the best possible matter. Still, ICE is the best place to set new connections and go for the given opportunities, and so we did. We've held a dozen of promising talks with partners from the UK, Malta, Canada, China, Cura√ßao and many others. Now it's time to convert these into an improved product and higher benefits for all the parties.  Alongside with the exhibition fields, we've been presented on ICE VOX conference, where probably the most interesting discussions took place with our colleagues from the blockchain igaming environment. While these guys develop their own approaches to gain players' sympathy, we deeply believe that together we build one of the most competitive and appealing infrastructures worldwide. No need to say that sharing expertise on this level is highly valuable both for the businesses and our clients.  All in all, ICE Totally Gaming 2018 has provided us with the industry's new insights and boosted awareness of True Flip in the B2B niche. At least, we clearly see that the chosen way results into good news almost daily, and these often go along with such events!  And, of course, stay updated with our news in social networks, chats and elsewhere you meet us Soon we'll report on the further travelling plans to cover some extra markets with the blockchain fair games!  Yours, TrueFlip Team

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: True Flip Halves Ticket Price For Its' 400 BTC Jackpot  True Flip is fulfilling its crowdsale pledge by presenting a revamped and redesigned interface for its decentralized fair games platform. The updated interface for blockchain lottery platform with instant payouts now has the ability to integrate products and options on-the-fly, enabling players to switch seamlessly between games.  Currently, players can switch between "Flip's Star" - a lottery game where players have to guess 6 numbers between 1 and 49, and Rapid To The Moon - a fast numerical draw game based on the speed of generating new blocks on the blockchain - on-the-go. Three more games are scheduled to be added to the platform between Q1 and Q2, 2018. These improvements represent the fulfillment of 60% of True Flip‚Äôs crowdsale pledge. The crowdsale successfully ended on July, 29 after raising 2000 BTC.  Read more: https://coinidol.com/true-flip-halves-ticket-price-for-its-400-btc-jackpot/

Author: FandangledGizmo
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: I was really excited about the huge jackpot, but the problem is though that I've spoken to a lot of lottery players and very few, <10% imo, want to play because they don't believe an Eastern Europe start-up will payout an $8 million jackpot.  So it's good you haven't spent too much on marketing because I think you will find such a small % would trust you to payout so it's not worth spending the money.  If you look at the big value players like FUN ($200 million valuation) It's all ZERO third party trust. The game is verified by the blockchain & a smart contract pays out the winnings.  Before you waste any money on marketing, do some market research and I believe you will find a $1 million jackpot controlled by a Smart Contract will be 100x more popular than an $8 million jackpot that requires you to trust a third party to pay out.  I understand the issues with smart contracts but for as long as all the jackpot/s are centrally controlled the valuation of TFL and the player base will be severely limited.  (Investors will like it too, if the Smart Contract automatically sends X% to TFL, a % to an investor fund and the remaining amount to the smart contract jackpot whenever a ticket is purchased.)

Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty

The same reason why exchanges don't manage their funds with smart contracts is the reason why we use our layers of protection just like them. Smart contracts also have points of failure and different from other software they can not be changed, check recently smart contract errors that lead to millions in losses on another company.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: Social Liberal
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Well the change is quite clear: the only dividend option is playing a game with the free tickets you get as token holder.. So rewards are uncertain indeed.  In my opinion the TrueFlip team made a bad choice here, fooling all the ICO investors. In the whitepaper and during ICO phase, rewards as in dividends were promised. When logging in on TrueFlip and visiting the token holder profile, you could make nice ROI calculations for different sold ticket quantities. Now it all turns into bullshit gambling/gaming. Even if the rewards are very small, as TrueFlip sells not so many lottery tickets as hoped, it's better to have a certain reward and % ROI, then gamble every quarter with "free" game tickets. You can see the huge price drop after the report, confirming that investors don't want to gamble.  As the dividends were one of the main reasons for me to invest in this ICO, I'm also considering selling all TFL. Good luck holders & TF team  Edit: looking at the 1% house edge, maybe the game is a good reward in the end. Still, forcing the token holders to play a game for their rewards, is not a nice thing to do. Most likely a marketing trick, to get them hooked to gaming/gambling? Curiously awaiting the game dynamics

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: CRAC-BAC-EiG !!!  Hey there,  Some of you might have noticed us staying silent during last week. Well, the reason is obvious ‚Äì True Flip was on tour again. We‚Äôve attended Crypto Affiliates Conference (CRAC) in Prague and then Excellence in iGaming (EiG) and Berlin Affiliate Conference (BAC) - making over 100 new connections to build True Flip the way it‚Äôs meant to be.   At CRAC, our CMO Kostya Katsev performed the event‚Äôs highlight speech on running a crypto lottery and presented the affiliate offer, resulting in huge traffic towards True Flip‚Äôs meeting point. Prague is a nice city, though we didn‚Äôt catch a moment to enjoy it, moving to the next destination.  EiG and BAC are completely devoted to gambling, so we tried not to miss the given opportunities. True Flip‚Äôs Head of communications Vasily Polynov took part in the EiG‚Äôs panel discussion on crypto gambling ‚Äì and did all good explaining True Flip to the affiliate community. BAC was an ultimate spot to achieve promising agreements and meet TFL holders, which makes us believe this business is emerging in favor of really cool people  Though taking part in such events can really exhaust you, profits are priceless. The bottom line is that we start testing traffic with the new partners ‚Äì to set up an efficient CPA model attracting thousands of new players to our beloved product.   And our journey continues with a trip to SIGMA‚Äô17 on November 23-24, so meet you there.  Follow True Flip official channels for all updates and save the date for Flipcast, which is published on November 9!   Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hi,  First, a friendly reminder that Flipcast, the team‚Äôs video presentation, will be published on October 27, 2017. Join True Flip social channels and get prepared to see lots of cool new stuff unveiled  Telegram NEWS https://t.me/truefliplotto Twitter https://twitter.com/TrueFlipLoto Facebook https://www.facebook.com/TrueFlip.io/ Medium https://medium.com/@trueflip/   Also, some important updates of True Flip we‚Äôd want you to know about:  1. Proof of tickets ‚Äì new option to be found in ‚ÄúArchive‚Äù, allowing users to download the complete list of playing tickets by the end of their sale (30 min prior to each Draw);  2. Players can now buy up to 100 tickets a time - for 111 upcoming draws. As well, discount program will be launched this week for bulk purchases;  3. We start accepting promo-codes this week;  4. Instant payouts now active for minor wins. A player doesn‚Äôt need to wait for admin approval to withdraw his funds;  5. True Flip goes through a significant redesign to offer new games in the most convenient way for our users  6. And a small teaser of the new game we are preparing for launch ‚Ä¶   In addition, our team will be happy to meet you on the following events:  ‚Ä¢ 30-31 Oct - Crypto Affiliates Conference, Prague  ‚Ä¢ 1-4 Nov - Berlin Affiliate Conference  ‚Ä¢22-25 Nov - Summit of iGaming Malta, SIGMA  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: CrRo
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: This project is getting worse by each day and appears to be more and more of a scam. You wonder why the price drops on exchanges that are worthless, it's cause the coinIs worthless. Here is why:  1) ico claimed working product with a successful launch and claimed to have been raising funds (specific % allocation) mostly for jackpot. 2 months later jackpot has only been made around 100 BTC and no attempts of marketing had been made.  2) ticket sales during ico seemed to have been fake/developer generated, as they plummeted into a few hundred a day if that (from over 10k a day during ico)  3) team hasn't done anything constructive in 2 months including to fail to get on any reputable exchanges. Words such as "minor updates" "version 2.0" and "soon" has been the only progress in the project. Oh yeah and someone won an art competition... They deem it an accomplishment to be able to send your tokens from MEW to the site wallet, calling it successful "parking". Unfortunately, to even try to withdraw your tokens you have to click all these confirmations, including email  just to come to a screen that says we will get back to you in 24 hours. I've also seen countless people having issues with withdrawals that take days to get funds out and hammering support.  4) there are claims of work constantly being done but nothing to show for: no marketing, no real jackpot, no ticket sales. (Remember working product...right) they haven't even figured out how to run a simple lotto but keep saying they are working on b2b, new games and partnership. In other words money raised by ico being spent on other things, totally ignoring the investors. Just adjusting a price to the rising BTC price took 3 weeks to fix, as if it was a miracle To do.  5) constant lies by the TFL team, first it was fixing WP last day of ico to "fix" the language (interesting enough language waschanged that would shaft the Investors). Some bullshit was made up about SEC, but not being able to even be listed on a single normal exchange obviously shows no effort made in that direction. Since the team has promised to launch the real jackpot in mid sep and ico participant dividends would start coming in oct. It's end of sep, no lottery, no news. No real explanation other than "we are working on it" and "soon". Token price is 1/3 of what it was during ico with 5k volume if that.  6) team seems incompetent, hiring consultants twice to get on exchange and failing both times or more likely lying, as both times those faceless consultants were blamed instead of taking responsibility   So if you are happy over some bounty program for tokens that are 1/3 of value 2 months later with no product in near future and scam team, this is the project for you.

Author: alexluthor
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: TRUE FLIP TEAM  Do you know why projects fail?  Google: major causes project failure  . Bad communication between relevant parties . Lack of planning / scheduling  Saying "It will be announce soon. Be patient" is a TERRIBLE communication. It looks like the investors are in a drifting ship. Nobody knows anything.  FunFair (FUN) doesn't have any product live, but the Market Cap is about US$ 100 million (33 x True Flip!!!) and trading volume US$ 500k a day. . There are clear and easy information about ROADMAP, TEAM, WHITEPAPER, BLOG on the HOMEPAGE. . The CEO (Jez) talks everyday in the Telegram chat. Check yourselves.  ABOUT SMARTBILLION, FUNFAIR, EDGELESS, ETC: don't underestimate the competition!!! Nokia in 2007 had +50% market share of smartphones. What is Nokia now?   SUGGESTION TO PUT ON MAIN MENU (not somewhere in the Whitepaper after several clicks):  DESKTOP VERSION: REMOVE from the MAIN MENU the tabs facebook, telegram, slack, twitter, youtube. You don't want the user go away from your page, right? These tabs are already at the foot of the page. Just let one tab for languages (not 3).  1) TAB INVESTOR . What is True Flip? Market Potential? ICO fund distribution? (US$ 8 million raised -- new investors need to know about this!) . Investor benefits? . Dates for revenue distribution? What do they need to do? . Where to buy tokens TFL? New exchanges? . Whitepaper  2) TAB ROADMAP . JACKPOT: When the ICO fund (+500 BTC) will be added to Jackpot?  In steps? set the DATES! . BCC: What will it be made with the 1196 BCC from the ICO? . MARKETING PLAN: when will it start? . AUDITABLE TICKETS SOLD:  True Flip has "fair draw process", but how about BEFORE the draw?  If someone hit the Jackpot one day after 500 BTC being added, how can you prove to investors that the ticket was sold? Or how can I prove that I bought a winner jackpot ticket? The information about tickets sold must be public, non editable, with timestamp BEFORE each draw. . NEW LOTTERIES: when?  If you don't have exact day, put week, month. But, put SOMETHING tangible. NOT "Soon. Be patient".  3) TAB BLOG (or NEWS) - link to Steemit or create your own page.  4) TAB TEAM - show your faces. If you put a short video, even better. The people will not think is a scam website. The idea/product is important, but investors invest in good team.  Best regards

Body: honestly this is a long term investment, i can see this company if not this idea becoming popular if not more profitable in the future simply by holding. However should they be able to include America soon it would no doubt lead to an explosion in value.  i do feel for you as well, it is very frustrating and disheartening to see your investment plummet in value (TFL tokens are not even worth half as much as ICO price right now) and to be honest with you i am a bit upset about it, but i am just going to hold...i would be loading up more with the cheap TFL tokens because i AM in for the long run but i also have some doubts and dont wish to expose myself further to more risk.  im not a pro or a whale or even a rich ( i have a small position of 1.5btc in) but my "guestimation" is when the first wave of dividends come around the price will surge up a bit because it will renew the faith in the company after which we can see a steady climb if not an explosion in value by the time the third or fourth wave comes around. this is because what the company lacks is not an idea, or product but rather faith.  it seems that most of the people posting in their threads and about them are uninformed and a bit hesitant to jump in. in fact i don't even know when the first payout is.

Author: Blake_Last
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: I think the tokens have already been sent to all participants of the Trueflip bounty campaign. The tokens are sent to the participants' Trueflip account. So if you created an account on their site, and you put it in the form that they asked participants to fill, then it's possible that you've already received it there. Just log in to your Trueflip account and view your token holder profile. If you received it, it will appear in the TFL. However, it is still not available for withdrawal and you still need to wait until their lottery is over before you can do so.

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello!  It‚Äôs Monday night here, and we launch the new weekly dispatch to become this project‚Äôs main newsletter for years ahead (we hope). So, meet State of True Flip, where we publish the past week‚Äôs developments and updates of the world‚Äôs #1 blockchain lottery!  - Token holder profile vastly redesigned, correct data on users' TFL # and % - Transaction history available now in the Token holder profile, with sorting options (refilled balance, bought tickets, winnings, funds withdrawal); - Bulk purchases finally work ‚Äì buy up to 100 tickets a time, for up to 150 future draws, program your numbers or choose auto fill; - Bitcoin Cash is now accepted along with BTC, LTC, ETH and DASH; - The Jackpot will increase to 100 BTC on 29/08 (tomorrow); - Security updated: separate 2FA and email confirmation added for secure funds/tokens withdrawal.  It seems plenty of stuff is done to provide a smoother UX for both players and token holders. But that‚Äôs just a beginning We‚Äôll keep you posted on the Team‚Äôs progress with this newsletter - once a week starting now. Of course, all other communications will continue in accordance with our workflow.  Yours, True Flip Team

Body: Dear hunters, hello!  I've finished counting stakes and tokens. You may check it on the spreadsheets of each campaign.     Signature campaign participants: https://goo.gl/X41SnY   Translation and community management Participants: https://goo.gl/w8MM6L  Blog Posts, Articles and Videos Participants: https://goo.gl/qJPos5  Facebook Participants: https://goo.gl/4zQv25   Twitter Participants https://goo.gl/PgyizB   Improvement and bug-fix roadmap: https://goo.gl/QVvUsz   If you are OK with your results, please fill one of these forms.  Before filling form you need to register on trueflip.io.  Fill this form if you took part in only one campaign. Just copy here the number from "Sum to put to the form" column.  One campaign participants https://goo.gl/UohBH7  This form for persons that took part in several campaigns. You need to sum up all of your tokens and put the sum to form.  Several campaigns participants https://goo.gl/pu4khX   If you are not OK with your results, 1.  check my report here https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15QUy6uxxip4898pGDg17Ndph6H-t5unScIBcRiTQXAY/edit  or here https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dBI6xNLjwHaFPmEd_j38HW1h2wKNo9OzgKv5_iKE2JI/edit#gid=993036935  On the tab with your name.  2. The rules about repost with comment and necessary quantity of posts are there on the main thread, I've leaved them there for this case. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1928663  3. Write me PM or email me to bounty@trueflip.io  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: True Flip‚Äôs TFL tokens are now listed on EtherDelta exchange  True Flip, the international blockchain lottery, has been listed on EtherDelta, a fully decentralized cryptocurrency exchange. The company‚Äôs TFL token is available now for deposits/withdrawals on this platform, follow the below address to find it:  https://etherdelta.github.io/#0xa7f976c360ebbed4465c2855684d1aae5271efa9-ETH  Please note that the Team-owned TFL tokens (20% of the initial emission) are stored safe and intact and won‚Äôt be subject to trade - in full accordance with White Paper. Every interested person can explore this by checking the following wallet:  https://etherscan.io/address/0x3371a4920A9aF5F7A645674Cd503933508Ff6818#tokentxns  True Flip has gained the total of 2000+ in Bitcoin equivalent (BTC, ETH, LTC and DASH were accepted) during its successful crowdsale conducted on 28.06-28.07.17. The company initially offered up to 21 000 000 tokens at the price of 0,0005 BTC per TFL. Over 3000 participants acquired the total of 6 200 000 TFLs, while the rest of the initial amount was ‚Äúburned‚Äù to proportionally increase each token holder‚Äôs percentage in the overall token amount.  The final overall amount of existing TFL after burning is 8 924 667 tokens. No more True Flip tokens will be issued, which brings additional value to this limited offer.  True Flip Team continues talks with major cryptocurrency exchanges to list TFL token on additional platforms.  More answers find on the official telegram chat  https://t.me/joinchat/AAAAAELcwT-fgH2zG7xEng  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello!  True Flip‚Äôs transition to version 2.0 is successfully finished! It took us quite a long time to fix everything ‚Äì nearly a week. But this is a result of making best efforts to move over 100k user accounts to a new platform as well as all Draw results, wins and transactions tracks, referrals and etc.  The overall update includes:  Complete replacement of transactional systems (now a central message bus processes all requests); [Payment gateways for crypotcurrencies now live as separate binaries on separate servers; All operations/transactions in our supported 4 cryptocurrencies are now stable and fast, BTC refill transactions processing has become 10x faster; Mass purchase option enabled ‚Äì buy packs of tickets a time, increase your winning chances; Subscription option enabled ‚Äì think ahead, choose your lucky numbers and let them play in numerous Draws in auto mode; Near 30 minor bugs fixed including various memory issues, latency problems; Data storage replaced from MySQL to NDB Cluster (2 copies of data at all time across all nodes); ZeroMQ gates and out-of-the box support for streaming changes (incremental updates PUB/SUB model); Overall load speed is up to 3x higher, bringing you a smooth gaming experience; Application has become distributed - many instances can co-exist. We'd also love to note that the listed changes are only a beginning. This update brings True Flip to a brand-new level of product quality, which allows us to kick start the long-awaited full-scale expansion!  In the next posts we‚Äôll focus on the details of achieving our milestones. Stay tuned!  p.s. Don't forget we have more news to share during Facebook live broadcast on Tuesday, August 15, at 14:00 UTC. Please send us your questions and concerns to qa@trueflip.io.  Yours, True Flip Team

Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello!  This week I believe to finish counting Facebook and Twitter stakes. After that I'll put tokens quantity to all the spreadsheets and give you the form to fill out.  There will be questions about your profile on Bitcointalk, about campaigns you've taken part in, your total quantity of tokens of all campaigns together, your profile email on trueflip.io and your ETH address you've given me on registration. Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: U.K.-BTC
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: My experiences with TrueFlip after a few weeks:    First the good part:  I deposited Bitcoin some weeks ago and played lottery with it several times at TrueFlip.io.  The system to play lottery works fine and easy to handling. Through the TrueFlip videos at Youtube I learned how to calculate the lottery numbers based on the block after the draw on blockchain. It is very transparent, even for me as a non-tech-freak.  I am very satisfied: the system works stably. I have played several draws, and even once won a small amount, even the payoff works perfectly.  Small note: It would be good if Deposit and Withdrawal were done faster for the future (automatically instead of manually by the team).   Now my worries:  Convinced by the system, I read the whitepaper and the token-sale papers at the beginning of the ICO. So I bought several TFL Tokens and am now proud token holder.  The reason for the token purchase is in my case less speculative (I am not altcoin- or token-trader), but more because I want to benefit from the distributions for tokenholders. As I understand the whitepaper, 10-15% of the lottery will go to the tokenholder. I se that like a dividend on stocks.  But meanwhile, many new information is circulating and I am something confused... I'm reading about a lottery for tokenholders (why not? I am happy to receive a lottery as a free gift). However, this does not replace the promise of the 10-15% to the tokenholders, and I am really expecting and want to receive tokens or coins for the 10-15%, and not just lottery tickets. I mean; please do not exchange the dividends with lotteries!  I also read that the 10-15% dividends are paid out every few months.  I would like to have more transparency and some explanations on this topic, if one of the team members can find the time to explain this in a few words for us, the next days here in this forum?  Best regards M

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello!  Thanks a lot for your emotions and concerns.  Nothing changes. The lottery for tokenholders was announced before ICO started. It is small bonus from us to tokenholders.  You concerns with revenues are understandable. But lets realise the situation. TrueFlip is working busyness. There are different rules about "dividends" in different countries. The regular lotteries for tokenholders with award for everyone is the way to give to the tokenholders their revenues.  We want to make TrueFlip great and transparent project. Please remember that making things are usually take more time than talking about them. And in the theory there is no difference between theory and practice, but in the practice it is.   Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello udppro,  math is obviously is not the strong side, so let's clear it again.  I have calculated one more time.  Here it was the mistake before:  total sold tokens = pre-ico tokens +ico tokens 6 247 267 = 1 050 000 + 5 197 267  http://prntscr.com/g3h14e from here  https://etherscan.io/token/0xa7f976c360ebbed4465c2855684d1aae5271efa9#balances   "burned" tokens (unproduced tokens that could be sold) 14 700 000 - 6 247 267 = 8 452 733  sold tokens = 70% of all tokens that might be produced  100% of tokens that will be exist after smart contract produce them in this way https://github.com/TrueFlip/trueflip-contracts  are 6 247 267*10/7 = 8 924 667.14285  Here may be some small corrections according to changed bonus after crossing the 2000btc boarder. And may be not.   20% of all tokens to the team 1784933.42857  10% of all tokens 892 466.714285  5% of all tokens for the Advisory 446 233.3571425  3% of all tokens for ICO bounty 267 740.0142855  2% of all tokens for the Escrow 178 493.342857   The Whitepaper says that bounty is 5% but doesn't say that all of them will be distributed in ICO bounty. ICO bounty was announced with 630 000 tokens that are 3% of 21 000 000 token limit.  There is no decreasing in bounty stake of all tokens.  There is decreasing in bounty tokens quantity because of decreasing the sold token quantity.  The quantity of Team token, Advisory tokens and Escrow tokens decreased too.  Everything is OK with this because tokens save their value.   Best Regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: mathbrand
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: ABOUT THE BOUNTY PROGRAM  1. The official document WHITE PAPER is clear (page 16):  https://trueflip.io/TrueFlip%20Whitepaper(01.06).pdf  6.Token Sale  TFL token distribution rules  Escrow 2% Advisors 3% Bounty 5% Team 20% Crowdsale 70%  If the bounty was 50% (fifty percent), it would be a clear mistake. It's not the case!  You are moving 2% from the "Bounty" to "Escrow+Advisors", according to the True Flip post on July 25, 2017: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1928663.msg20370138#msg20370138  Are the "Escrow and/or Advisors" putting pressure on True Flip Team to change the rule?   2. The initial post on Bitcointalk.org is clear: "True Flip bounty fund consists of 630 000 True Flip Tokens". https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1928663.0  It's a FIXED amount without any warning: "  * subject to total tokens sold  "  Unfortunately, someone put the wrong information on bitcointalk.org, but the team had  +60 days to correct this wrong information.   3. There is no WRITTEN information about "3% for the bounty" --- no assumption, please!   4. There are 2 options for the bounty payment: 1 (the official document) or 2 (non official - announcement made by mistake/miscommunication).  There is no cash disbursement.  It's just equity dilution (very small).  True Flip will lose in any court around the world, if use any other option. Will the company reserve part of the funds to cover this potential liability risk?   5. The company starts with a very bad reputation: : " True Flip doesn't follow the White Paper ".  Can some rules in the White Paper be changed? Yes.  But not in this case, when the people have already worked +60 days on the bounty program!!! If someone used some breach on the bounty program to be reward (fake accounts, followers), just remove the participant.  How can the clients TRUST in this online lottery? Will the Jackpot be paid? Or will there be EXIT SCAM? Will the investors receive dividends? Or is the White Paper wrong too?  Which information is CORRECT in the White Paper?  Do not associate the brand True Flip to a potential SCAM! That would be the worst thing to an online lottery.  Investors invest in good TEAM. You have made an amazing job until now!  BUT, True Flip technology is easily replicable!   Make the correct decision!

Author: FandangledGizmo
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Congrats, excited about this one.  Vslice for example has done a few million dollars in betting volume in a year+,  which with a 2% edge translates to probably less than $50 000 paid out to shareholders & they're valued at $30 million. The other $30-50 million valuations for EDG & FUN are speculative at this stage.  TrueFlip is already selling 3-5k tickets a day with a low jackpot, with the new million dollar+ jackpot & occasional advertising on coinmarketcap  they could quickly get to 15-20k tickets a day. Which would translate into a few million dollars a year for shareholders.  So VSlice would have to get 50X bigger to match what TrueFlip could already do very quickly and EDG & FUN would also require hundreds of millions in volume to pay shareholders a similar amount because the house edge of other games is much smaller.  So TrueFlip could already be valued much higher than them and if they reach their roadmap target of making it much more decentralised and automated by early next year, it could do very well indeed.

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello signature bounty participants,  I'm counting your stakes.  If you see that your total stakes are counted, you may take away your signature. If you see "?" I give you a chance till midnight today to make some posts to take stakes for last week.  The information of stake value and your next steps to get tokens will be available next week.  If you have questions, contact me by PM, I'll answer you on monday.  Thank you for participation.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello mentalpanda  It seems that you don't undestand the main point. We want to pay people for thier articles even if they don't eligable to the first rules.  It is the reason they come to the list.  Now I want to value it fairly.  So, what's wrong with it? Hello zedicus  your post seems to be like posts from person with multi account, like low quality posts. I've marked it to remember myself to watch on them - will the moderators delete them or not.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: CanErik on July 28, 2017, 06:04:44 AM Hi;  Can you remove my username from your signature campaign please?  Thank you.  Hello,  you already get stakes for 1 week. Don't you want to get them?  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: mvillar on July 27, 2017, 03:00:49 PM Why has the ICO been extended one more day?   Hello mvillar  It was extended till the end of today in last time zone.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: mylabs01 on July 27, 2017, 12:14:08 PM Quote from: TrueFlip.io on July 27, 2017, 12:01:00 PM Quote from: mylabs01 on July 27, 2017, 10:48:15 AM Quote from: TrueFlip.io on July 25, 2017, 10:57:30 AM Quote from: TGD on July 24, 2017, 01:19:55 PM Quote from: herdiansyahdanang on July 24, 2017, 12:43:24 PM Quote from: mylabs01 on July 24, 2017, 08:52:24 AM Quote from: TrueFlip.io on July 24, 2017, 06:00:32 AM Quote from: LEEMEEGO on July 22, 2017, 02:17:36 PM Quote from: LEEMEEGO on July 20, 2017, 11:47:44 AM hi, i just want to clarify..  is 630 000 True Flip Tokens fix for bounty? regardless of how much will be raised during the ico?  hey dev, bumping for this.. i saw you replied to others's posts but missed mine.. i guess you overlooked it.. m just curious and i just wanna know if this is fix.  thanks.  Hello LEEMEEGO  Yes, this quantity of tokens fixed for bounty regardless of how much will be raised during the ico.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io  wow, so 630000 tokens which has .0005 sats each? so you will have 315 BTC allocated for the bounty.. such a huge amount.i hope your team will not reduced it since i think it will be impossible to reach the max cap withing 4 days.  indeed, thats the big amount for allocated bounty 315 BTC max cap for 4 days left is too hard, but already rised 2500+ BTC its still awsome for now  that is the main reason why too many participants interested to  join this campaign because of high allocated amount for bounties well i hope no more exchange of the bounty pool happen after the last update deduction .  Hello LEEMEEGO, mylabs01, herdiansyahdanang, TGD and other bounty participants  I've gave you incorrect information. I've check it in the Whitepaper.  The correct information is: The bounty and the team stakes will be counted after token sale finished by this way. All purchased tokens (both preICO and ICO) are 70%. We issue extra 3% for bounty 7% for advisory and escrow 20% for team.  So the stakes still the same, but the total quantity will known only after ICO finished.  Our contracts: https://github.com/TrueFlip/trueflip-contracts  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   are you sure about this? so you mean that what you have written in the OP is just a mere lie or something?  as what written in the op,  "True Flip bounty fund consists of 630 000 True Flip Tokens."  and now you are saying that  the bounty will be known after the ico because its only 3% of what is being sold?  correct me if i misunderstood.   Hello mylabs01  If you count 3% from 21 000 000 tokens you will get 630 000. The sum is the same as announced.  Now, when the quantity of sold tokens are not 21 000 000, the quantity of bounty tokens are not the same, but they still have the same weight - to get profits or to sold. In some ways it is even better that quantity of tokens became less.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   so in other words, the bounty is a rate or percentage based rather than a fixed amount?  Hello mylabs01,  yes, it is. Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello herdiansyahdanang  Yes, the bounty tokens will go to the investor profiles, not directly to ETH wallets.  There will be instruction to check stakes and say to me your account, which I could recognize like yours.  Now, while I'll check different campaignes you may do your sign in to trueflip.io and check me in counting.  Today will be counted signatures for last week. Total stakes for all campaignes will come next 2 weeks.  There will be forms, you need to fill with your email if you have stakes only in one campaign of in several. I'll start to give forms when the campaignes will became complitely counted. This you may see at the participants list. There muts be filled out "Total stakes" row, it means that campaign is counted.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: CrRo
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: I had sent e-mail about this yesterday, but it wouldn't hurt to get an answer in an open forum. I like the project so I had participated in the ICO yesterday, but noted a few things that I would like to get clarification on.  - There are 2 versions of whitepaper that I have seen change past 24 hours, both listed as version 1.0 (I have screen shots of both and both were downloaded from ICO page with 40 minute difference). One of them promises dividends of 10-15% to all token holders from daily ticket sales while other (latest) promises only "special" lottery for token holders 4 times a year. Additionally the ICO webpage still promises 10-15% dividends. What is going on and which is the correct investor incentive?  - token purchase was seamless, there was no need for extra step of contract execution, sending funds from MEW to ICO address and TFL tokens were in MEW within minutes. However, they are not reflected in TFL holder profile. As per the latest white paper version the tokens need to be "parked" on the token holder profile, so how is that accomplished?  - why does the number of contributions keep dropping below 1900 BTC? it was over 1900 a day ago now back below 1900.  - slack channel invitation page keeps returning tokens_voided when clicking join and no invitation in e-mail.

Author: mentalpanda
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: This is the message that was sent to bog bounty participants about an hour ago:    Blogs were accepted and stakes were already given. Now, you are telling people that not everyone will get paid. You have excepted over 250 blog posts for the last 4 weeks. If you were not going to pay, why did you keep adding them on the sheet. Isn¬¥t that pretty much same as scamming people to advertise your project for free?  It seems like you guys are looking for a way to not pay all participant since the money collected is huge. This seems like an attempt  to give a small cut from the cake to people who worked hard.  You are making up new rules after ico is over. Why did you not say that in the beggining instead of encouraging all this people to post more and more on their blog, steemit and youtube account?  One last thing, if one has a blog that has more than 1000 daily visitors, they would surely find more profitable ways to earn money rather than hunting ico bounties.

Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Read their whitepaper, you were not puzzled by the following: all will be released 21.000.000 tokens, if they collect everything they want, let's say they collected half, let out 10mln TFL, the chance to win a jackpot 1: 50mln (the remaining 11 million were destroyed.) And how many? May decide to issue 100 billion for example. Then what's the point of keeping them?

Author: FandangledGizmo
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: AFAIK they will not issue any more TFL tokens after the ICO, TFL not sold in the ICO will be burned & after that there is no more burning or issuing I believe.  Instead 10-15% of all ticket sales will be held in BTC/ETH and distributed to TFL holders once every 3 months provided you deposit/park your TFL at dividend time. (In future I assume dividend distribution will be handled by a smart contract.)

Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: I know, so the question remains, what will happen after players use all their tickets, playing the lottery? In the case of using 1 TFL to participate in the game - it burns out or passes to the developers, so the total amount of TFL will eventually fail.

Author: FandangledGizmo
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: I think players will use BTC/ETH to participate in the game. (TFL holders get 10-15% of the BTC/ETH spent on lottery tickets as a dividend distributed every 3 months based on how much TFL you own. So if 1000 BTC was spent on lottery tickets over 3 months, up to 150 BTC would be given to TFL holders. If you held 10% of all TFL you would receive up to a 15 BTC dividend for those 3 months.)  If they also accepted TFL for lottery tickets it wouldn't be burnt but just sold on the market. So the total amount of TFL wouldn't fall. (Even if TFL was burnt, the worst case is would just cost less TFL for 1 ticket.)

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Quote from: aimer1488 on July 26, 2017, 01:49:23 PM Hi sir, i fill the form, but I'm not in the table. Why?  Hello aimer1488  The list is updated. Welcome!  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: FandangledGizmo on July 26, 2017, 06:33:06 PM In the short term I hope you hire a few more support staff as it seems there are often quite a few withdrawal issues in particular cropping up and some improved communication concerns/requests. In the medium term I hope you are able to achieve your roadmap goal of making TrueFlip decentralised and largely automated by early 2018, this is clearly critical to the long term success, viability and market value of the project.   But the numbers are there.  A $1 million+ jackpot is far more appealing to recreational gamblers than other games of chance and their odds are better than existing traditional lotteries.  The 10-15% of revenue shareholders earn is much higher than any other gambling format.  There is currently low/no competition in the crypto market & it is hard to enter as it requires $ millions in seed jackpot capital.  If you do a good job, TFL jackpots could rapidly grow to a size that would be even harder for new ICO's/Competitors to match.   Lots of potential here, good luck.   Hello FandangledGizmo,  Thank you!  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello U.K.-BTC  PM me please your email, we will add you to the group. Sorry for inconvenience.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io       Quote from: Rasta87 on July 24, 2017, 03:24:53 PM Hi, i just entered the ICO and because I use different wallets I bought once with BTC and once with ETH. The TFL I bought with ETH instantly came to MyEtherwallet. The TFL i bought with BTC came after maybe 30 min to Myetherwallet too.  Now My Questions are: 1.: In the TrueFlip Token Holder Prfile I only see the the Tokens from the BTC order, not those from the ETH order, Will it be updated so i can see the hole TFL there. 2.: Do I have to send them somehow to the Token Holder Profile to get Profiits later or do i just let them Stay on MyEtherWallet?  Sorry if already answered somehow but i realy searched and found nothing the last 60min Please answer quick, i want to buy some more before it closes but need more info  Hello Rasta87  1. By ETH you have bought directly from smart contract. This way your tokens don't appear at the investor profile. It is OK. 2. It is not necessary to hold your tokens in the investor profile. You may keep them anywhere. When the time come, there will be instruction for use special smart contract.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: zedsacs on July 24, 2017, 04:23:31 PM Hi! I'm currently in your campaign. Let say the sig campaign is done, where can we receive our token? on the eth wallet? is it already converted to eth or what? Hehe sorry for that kind of question because it is my first-time to join an a ICO campaign.  Hello zedsacs  You will get tokens to the investor profile at the trueflip.io. You may convert them to eth or btc when the token come to exchange.  All instructions to check stakes and tokens quantity I'll give next week for different participants.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: Zero1One0 on July 27, 2017, 01:59:44 AM It seems that less than 6 million tokens will be sold in the ICO. This means that those who purchased TFL tokens will get more of the 10-15% every 3 months. That is if TFL will be true to their word.  Hello Zero1One0  Yes, it is in absolute numbers.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: FandangledGizmo
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: In the short term I hope you hire a few more support staff as it seems there are often quite a few withdrawal issues in particular cropping up and some improved communication concerns/requests. In the medium term I hope you are able to achieve your roadmap goal of making TrueFlip decentralised and largely automated by early 2018, this is clearly critical to the long term success, viability and market value of the project.   But the numbers are there.  A $1 million+ jackpot is far more appealing to recreational gamblers than other games of chance and their odds are better than existing traditional lotteries.  The 10-15% of revenue shareholders earn is much higher than any other gambling format.  There is currently low/no competition in the crypto market & it is hard to enter as it requires $ millions in seed jackpot capital.  If you do a good job, TFL jackpots could rapidly grow to a size that would be even harder for new ICO's/Competitors to match.   Lots of potential here, good luck.

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello LEEMEEGO, mylabs01, herdiansyahdanang, TGD and other bounty participants  I've gave you incorrect information. I've check it in the Whitepaper.  The correct information is: The bounty and the team stakes will be counted after token sale finished by this way. All purchased tokens (both preICO and ICO) are 70%. We issue extra 3% for bounty 7% for advisory and escrow 20% for team.  So the stakes still the same, but the total quantity will known only after ICO finished.  Part of smart contract code:  /// @notice Finalize ICO     /// @dev Required state: Success     function finalizeICO()       public       onlyOwner     {         require(!isActive());         require(block.number >= startBlock);          icoFinalized = true;         uint256 icoCoins = token.totalSupply();          uint256 boardPercent = teamPercentOfTotal + advisoryPercentOfTotal;         uint256 percentTokens = div(icoCoins, 100 - boardPercent);          uint256 teamTokens = mul(percentTokens, teamPercentOfTotal);         uint256 advisoryTokens = mul(percentTokens, advisoryPercentOfTotal);          tokensIssuedDuringICO = add(icoCoins, teamTokens);         tokensIssuedDuringICO = add(tokensIssuedDuringICO, advisoryTokens);          require(token.mint(teamAddress, teamTokens, false));         require(token.mint(advisoryAddress, advisoryTokens, false));         require(token.finalize());     }  uint public constant teamPercentOfTotal = 20; uint public constant advisoryPercentOfTotal = 10;   Our contracts: https://github.com/TrueFlip/trueflip-contracts  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: Rasta87
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hi, i just entered the ICO and because I use different wallets I bought once with BTC and once with ETH. The TFL I bought with ETH instantly came to MyEtherwallet. The TFL i bought with BTC came after maybe 30 min to Myetherwallet too.  Now My Questions are: 1.: In the TrueFlip Token Holder Prfile I only see the the Tokens from the BTC order, not those from the ETH order, Will it be updated so i can see the hole TFL there. 2.: Do I have to send them somehow to the Token Holder Profile to get Profiits later or do i just let them Stay on MyEtherWallet?  Sorry if already answered somehow but i realy searched and found nothing the last 60min Please answer quick, i want to buy some more before it closes but need more info

Author: Frank37
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Don't know why, but i cant decide to take part on that ICO. To many things went wrong.  1. Was a big Moduloerror in algorithm, one number couldn't be choosen from algo. Maybe it was misfortune with the Moduloerror, but in a lottery the algo of creating random numbers is a core element and has to be 100 % checked related to the equal distribution. Whats about all people who had won, but didn't get their money because of not choosing their number?  2. The case, why you were downvoted in trust, of course it is solved now, but it happend, because of not good caring of user. 3. On contribution site, related to the actual 20 % bonus i read "The specified bonus is non-guaranteed ..." this is crap. 4. Your free ticket to test your lottery is still not ready as promised. If I click pay, it says "insufficient fund". 5. Your login procedure is buggy, logged me out often while surfing on your site. 6. To many complaints about withdrawals and wallet-problems here and therefore no trust, that your devs can secure our funds against hacker attacks, see Moduloerror.   Not big things alone, but together it can't convince me to take part.

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello d0flaming0  I've marked it in spreadsheet.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: locbtc on July 19, 2017, 05:17:27 PM Hi Team, I just go around website, on Profile Settings page, it's title is wrong: "Settings - Treu Flip"  By the way, I have a referer register but I have not receive free ticket?  Hello locbtc  We'll fix it.  The free ticket system is out of order because we are moving to new version, without known bugs. This sustem is good but there is no ICO module. This time developers are finding ways to open free tickets before ICO finished.   Best regards, TrueFlip.io     Quote from: hmagalhaes on July 19, 2017, 08:02:33 PM Quote from: TrueFlip.io on July 19, 2017, 11:46:28 AM Quote from: hmagalhaes on July 19, 2017, 02:37:45 AM I can see on top of Investor Page this: "BTC/LTC: 0.01820787 BTC/DASH: 0.067231767 BTC/ETH: 0.0930521776"  What is it?  Ps. I sent this same question to the contact form on your site (24h ago), but nothing until now.  Hello hmagalhaes  It is exchange rates.  PS. We'll check the contact form.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Thanks for replying, but... Exchange rates of what? (Feeling noob...)  Hello hmagalhaes  It is correlation between coins BTC/LTC BTC/DASH BTC/ETH  The price is in BTC, but you may pay in different coin. It is for your information. Update every 5 minutes.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io       Quote from: Kishan748 on July 19, 2017, 08:56:35 PM I have just posted article on medium and filled the form, will it considerd? https://medium.com/@IkishanShah/trueflip-international-anonymous-blockchain-lottery-475f365f1040  Hello Kishan748  Yes, it will be. You will get stakes if there will be more than 200 views on it.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: satator on July 20, 2017, 12:17:08 AM How I understood to receive dividends I must hold my tokens on site true flip. How I can send TFL from myetherwallet to site?  Hello satator  to recieve dividends you should put your tokens on special smart contract, that comes in time. Now you may keep them anywhere you want.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: fantasm42 on July 20, 2017, 08:53:06 AM Quote from: TrueFlip.io on July 19, 2017, 01:04:00 PM  Thank you for your help but there is withdrawal mistake. Hope will be fixed nearest time.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Thanks, my problem is over, the ETH was added to the wallet  Hello fantasm42  Nice to know!  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: vanBlack on July 20, 2017, 11:55:00 AM Any fresh news about listing on exchange?  Hello vanBlack  They are coming two weeks after ICO finished.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: virtualgoods on July 20, 2017, 08:31:35 AM Quote from: Fibbage on July 20, 2017, 12:49:07 AM How do I obtain my coins? I've made my contribution through Parity with ETH directly, but nothing's in my Parity account.  Same here i used BTC to buy but nothing in my account. it is more than 24 hours but still no solution...  Hello virtualgoods and Fibbage  Could you please prove me with your details by PM or by support@trueflip.io (this way is more faster).  I need to know your ID transactions, registration email and full story of your situation.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: Isaaq.Almaguer on July 20, 2017, 11:05:40 AM Quote from: waynechong1995 on July 20, 2017, 10:52:00 AM The ICO seems very slow to reach even 2000 btc? its 20% bonus   That's because their dividends are very low, check out their calculator on the website, ROI won't happen before 3 years, and that's an optimistic scenario  Hello Isaaq.Almaguer  It is interesting oppinion. Thank you!  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: Frank37 on July 20, 2017, 12:18:47 PM Don't know why, but i cant decide to take part on that ICO. To many things went wrong.  1. Was a big Moduloerror in algorithm, one number couldn't be choosen from algo. Maybe it was misfortune with the Moduloerror, but in a lottery the algo of creating random numbers is a core element and has to be 100 % checked related to the equal distribution. Whats about all people who had won, but didn't get their money because of not choosing their number?  2. The case, why you were downvoted in trust, of course it is solved now, but it happend, because of not good caring of user. 3. On contribution site, related to the actual 20 % bonus i read "The specified bonus is non-guaranteed ..." this is crap. 4. Your free ticket to test your lottery is still not ready as promised. If I click pay, it says "insufficient fund". 5. Your login procedure is buggy, logged me out often while surfing on your site. 6. To many complaints about withdrawals and wallet-problems here and therefore no trust, that your devs can secure our funds against hacker attacks, see Moduloerror.   Not big things alone, but together it can't convince me to take part.  Hello Frank37  Thank you for your oppinion. It is important.  1. The mistake was and it is a big luck to know about it on the start. Thanks for community. 2. Some things you may know only at the way, when they happens. There wasn't plan like this. 3. This is reality. How may exactly know the time your transaction will be proceed? Maybe the time when bonus decrease? 4. Yes, they are. Free tickets and the ICO module are on the different platforms. We are sorry. You may buy one ticket to try, it works. 5. This suggest is in the improvement bounty. Now we know that there are people who feel unconvenience about it. 6. Too many complains are exist. And too many cases where everything is good exist. You haven't know about it. Or maybe don't want to know.   Everyone make his own decisions. Please, hear to your heart and brain. Only you know what do you want exactly. Take care.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Body: Hello Weter29  Counted!  Best regards, TrueFlip.io    Quote from: fantasm42 on July 15, 2017, 11:14:27 PM Quote from: TrueFlip.io on July 15, 2017, 06:50:34 PM  Hello fantasm42  Sorry for delay in coming refill. There were some troubles yesterday. They are fixed now.  Make it clear for me please - you want to refill you balance or you want to refund?  To discover it I need your email. Please write it to me by PM.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io  Hi, I would like  to refill my balance i send my email  in PM  Thank you, started investigation. See you transfer to refill address, fixing balance.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io   Quote from: lolgreglol on July 15, 2017, 10:03:29 PM Quote from: TrueFlip.io on July 15, 2017, 06:59:31 PM Quote from: lolgreglol on July 14, 2017, 10:16:29 PM i don't post often in fact, i don't think ive ever posted before since im happy with just lurking. ive already got a small investment in your ICO trueflip because i honestly believe in the product, and i would love to invest more if i had the funds.  now the reason for this post is one issue i seem to be having with your service. i had deposited around .10 btc your wallet/refill address or whatever it is as of now 2 days ago.  i then changed my mind and decided i wanted to put those funds elsewhere instead of gambling them and filled out a withdrawal request to another address for around .10 btc -fees  i have yet, as of 2 days now received my funds. it's only a mere .10 btc but i would be upset if i lost it. i have asked on the website, i have written an email and received NO response. then i went and had a look on your own website on the deposits/withdrawal section you have which i believe is for transparency. while the deposit section appear to be up to date, your withdrawal section has got to be completely incorrect. because it shows av********** 0.04000 18a3dcf81180d140cdc42290cb395bb503f81f401fd12e58dcb78d319bc40225 14/07/2017 dav********** 0.95500 83d649accb54be5ef3ae053b89f7a801808dd6147b0a9a3aeba41d4def058a35 14/07/2017 arn****** 0.03299 effadb17d1df8a58ee723c2c0cee6a255877dceec9e59148caf5a50b7ac3c7f7 10/07/2017 lim*** 0.02000 d9ad367ebd7a3414269e556dd404cf64b28cab4b58724f380c4031cb81c56f49 08/07/2017 tec******** 0.07340 e4af86704c0c23b54963bf5016562f560584eaee693b623729b2370e8f71a43b 08/07/20  which means that nobody withdrew ANY funds between the 10th of July until today the 14th of July. this is not true, i have ATTEMPTED to withdraw funds on the 11th of July.  in summary,  Trueflip. Please check your transactions because you guys owe me some of my own BTC  other than that. i like the ico and the way its going, but seriously, please send me my money.  Hello lolgreglol  Thank you for your message!  Withdrawal are making not everyday manually. Sometimes it takes about 4 days. In your case it maybe like this.  I see no unanswered issues, so hope you have your answer and will get your money soon.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io  thanks for the response, ill be on the lookout. im assuming you mean 4 business days, right?  Usually calendar days. You may let me know you email by PM, I'll ask about your request.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: alexluthor
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hi!  1) According to the "Ticket Structure", 60% of money raised goes to Daily Jackpot.  SUGGESTION  You could distribute the 60% in portions, for example: Daily Jackpot: 50% of the money raised daily Weekly Jackpot: 6% of each day accumulate to the Sunday (at least 6 x 6% = 36% of money raised daily --- considering average tickets sold a day) Monthly Jackpot: 3% of each day accumulate to the end of the Month (at least 30 x 3% = 90% of money raised daily) Annual Jackpot: 1% of each day accumulate to the end of the Year (at least 365 x 1% = 365% of money raised daily)  If on average the money raised daily is USD 100.000, then: Daily Jackpot: USD 50.000 Weekly Jackpot: at least USD 36.000 Monthly Jackpot: at least USD 90.000 Annual Jackpot: at least USD 365.000  In this way, you are always building a huge Jackpot.  2) Beyond this, on the ICO page is written "Tiket" in the middle of the section "Ticket Structure".  I have already sent an email to Improvement bounty.  Regards

Author: Zero1One0
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Thanks for responding Natalia.  5. ERC-20 token is still unverified. But there are different possibilities to get tokens to your wallet or to leave them at the investors profile. - When will the ERC-20 token be verified? - Will the ERC-20 tokens be linked to the investor profile? It just shows Your tokens = 0, Invested in total = 0, Your share = 0%. Like I said, I could have easily added more to the ICO (probably some other ICO participants tested it with as small amount as well to see how it goes) but hesitated to add more since they could not see how their tokens link to the investor profile and are just holding on to their tokens.  6. Could you please give me more details. How were you counting this interesting sum. - The Trueflip website computed that if I purchase 20 tokens, 6 tokens will be bonus and then it gave me the number of ETH required that I should transfer to the contract. I transferred the ETH it stated but the contract only returned 24.946558 TFL's. Basically, it's not 30%.

Author: Zero1One0
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: To WHOEVER is RUNNING the TrueFlip.Io Account. ************************************************ PLEASE GET YOUR MANAGEMENT TEAM TO READ THIS!!! ************************************************  I‚Äôm one of the early small investors when TrueFlip opened their ICO on their first day. I was thinking that it would have sold out in only a few days for the following reasons: 1.   They have an excellent product, I mean lottery, come on, this sells everywhere and everyone would have wanted to be part of it. 2.   They are the ‚Äúfirst‚Äù provably fair blockchain lottery. 3.     They don‚Äôt have to reinvent the wheel, Trueflip already has a solid product and even a working product.  I see several issues why TrueFlip‚Äôs ICO isn‚Äôt selling out fast: 1.   I think there is only 1 or 2 guys providing support (probably the poor IT guys again doing everything). I see lots of questions taking lots of time to be answered. 2.   Where is the management team and community team? They should have their own names/handles in bitcointalk, Slack (almost realtime reply is very important), etc. Not just the TrueFlip.io account. This past month saw the boom in ICO and almost every ICO I participated in, the entire team, from the CEO down to the Dev‚Äôs they are there to provide support. Sadly, I don‚Äôt see or feel it here in TrueFlip. 3.   I tried their Slack to get immediate response to questions some 2 weeks back, it‚Äôs not working. Is it working now? 4.   Their support in their website isn‚Äôt working. 5.   Their ERC-20 token is still unverified. Some don‚Äôt even see it when they use Etherscan.Io. (To those who have this issue, add the token manually (via add custom token). If you see it, transfer it to a new or a 2nd MEW wallet (if you have it), only then you‚Äôll be able to see the token appear. 6.   Their bonus isn‚Äôt correct (I should have gotten 30% since I joined on the first day, but instead only got 24.5%, which I really don‚Äôt mind)  TrueFlip could have been one of the best ICO‚Äôs but sadly it‚Äôs ICO is not being run by its management properly.  I would have invested more and would have spent time to give ideas how to run multiple lottery games in one day (since it can or is already fully automated) but decided not to spend time on those ideas since I don‚Äôt see the management‚Äôs commitment.  I hope they get everyone in their team committed to the ICO.

Author: laviehn
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello TrueFlip,  Thank for your answer. And I have more questions: I found in whitepaper that:   "10-15% from each sold ticket will be distributed among all Token holders as dividends -   to receive a dividend, the holders must park their Tokens on the lottery server; 10-15% (the exact amount will be decided by voting) of revenue from each ticket sold will be distributed among TFL Token holders based on the number of tokens they hold as outlined in the picture. Only ‚Äúlocked‚Äù balances will be participating in reward payouts. As tickets are sold in Bitcoin, conversion to Ether will happen, and bonuses will be paid directly to the addresses of Token holders."  So if I want to receive dividends, I must:    - park my Tokens on the lottery server => My TFL tokens is now in MEW, how I park them on the lottery server ?    - Only ‚Äúlocked‚Äù balances will be participating in reward payouts. => Does it mean I must lock my tokens and how ?  I am newbie, please to instruct  Thanks & Best regards,
