Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Thank you mbx, stevens129, Pischa  so much for your patience, support and staying involved to our project!  We are going to make this project and ourselves better and better.  We appreciate a lot if you help us with meeting persons who make the project improvement faster and more efficient.  Sorry about that comment with "The White paper says.." there was no intention to be rude.  People were tired from misunderstanding the process. Some of them want see their tokens at wallets, some of them want to see them at the investors panel. Definitely it has no meaning where they are before ICO ends. And all of this including the way of awarding with dividends exist at the White paper.  But we should be polite and better understandable.  Are we are like a team enough transparent for you or anonymous?  Here at this thread and on bounty campaign TrueFlip.io is me, Natalia Lukina.  You may find me directly on bounty chat https://t.me/joinchat/DgiyKkJe-SOvbwURmdun6A   or TrueFlip.io - Official channel https://t.me/joinchat/AAAAAELcwT-fgH2zG7xEng  At the official channel chat you may find all the team except of developers.  Thank you one more time for feedback!  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: Pischa
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Dear Trueflip,  I have been in the business since 2011 and I start to get the impression that you guys don¬¥t have the capacity to fix everything.  I just want to say it is no shame to ask for help. There are many people in the community who would be glad and honored to help out!!  Even if something has to be changed in the whitepaper and it will not affect us as investors too much it will be completely acceptable.  We just want succes in the end.  I hope you guys realize what we have on hand here...   You as Trueflip look pretty anonymous,  so that is the perfect setting to absolutely screw and *uck up all the Lottery systems in the world!!  I mean with all that money your team has after the ico, they can go play around in the the swimmingpools and seas for the rest of your lives around the world but whats the point? For the guys who are early investors here know what I mean..  it really isn¬¥t satisfying after a while.  I can tell you from experience. Have been living in luxury hotels for years. but if you have Trueflip running succesfully and than go in the hotels it would feel so rewarding and you will look yourself in the mirror so proudly.  I mean if this works you will have something and created something so extremely satisfying for the rest of your and our lives.  Please lets put our heads together and create this to a succes, And we screw all the lotteries in the world together!!     Don¬¥t loose this oppertunity please its a once in a lifetime chance!  You will feel proud that you have created something extraordinairy and will write history. please ask the community or some big names for help. I am very confident that if you would get some good names involved your ico will be sold out in a few days!  I personally want to invest a few more bitcoins, and I can easily tell some other bitcoin holders if you would do the above.  I mean you can not leave us waiting and now saying you have more time according to the whitepaper..   please guys lets join forces!!  do not loose this chance!!  Ask some people openly !  and if Andreas Antonopoulos or some other name gives a final touch on it or completely fix some of your issues this could could really go to crazy high $.   but the way it goes now it seems this thing could turn into a disaster!

Author: mbx
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Agree with all of the above. I hope the ICO campaign isn't any indication of how the platform will eventually develop. With the right amount of enthusiasm, customer service, and dedication this ICO could be so much more. Replies such as "You agreed to the white paper..." isn't the right way to conduct business. The idea can be much better conveyed if they just said "TFLs will be awarded at the end of the campaign". The replies seem rude to people who aren't from East Europe (even though that may not be the intention). Please hire someone who understands how to deal with multiple cultures empathetically. If comments are written in English then please hire a native born English speaker as well.  I am willing to help.

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello everybody!  Thank you for continuing to ask questions, for messages about successful getting token and for support us.  We have 3 groups of participants: 1. Who send ETH directly to smart contract - they've already received TFL tokens (if not see instruction above how to add custom token in MEW) 2. Who send other currences and added their ETH wallet - today (in 4-6 hours) we will give instruction how to receive them through smart contract. 3. Who send coins but haven't added ETH wallet or mistaken it - we will give instructions in nearest 2-3 days.  As I see most of questions are from 3 part. And when I give you id of external transaction, you may see that your token are reserved for you. We are developing the way to take them out.  Please, sorry for delay,  feel free to ask me about your external transactions.  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Update from official telegram chat.  We're still here and alive Thanks for your trust, we really appreciate it!  We‚Äôve raised more than $1,3 mln during the fist hour of True Flip‚Äôs crowdsale. Over 900 BTCs have been collected by this moment ‚Äì so be quick in case you‚Äôre interested in the 30% bonus!  And actually there are over 550 co-owners of True Flip now!  IN CONCERN OF ALL QUESTIONS DEVOTED TO TOKENS, their allocation and etc.  All the purchased TFLs have been successfully allocated on the smart contract, so please be sure there are no problems with your participation ‚Äì regardless of separate issues many of you have faced.  It seems, we‚Äôve just fixed the issue with displaying your purchased TFLs in the Investor profiles. Go take a look, it should work now!  In general, we have 3 groups of participants:  1.    Those who sent ETH directly to smart contract - they've already received TFL tokens. If not, follow the instruction below to add a custom token and get your TFLs: - go to Myetherwallet.com - find the option to add a custom token (in the right bottom) - add the following data: - address: 0xa7f976C360ebBeD4465c2855684D1AAE5271eFa9 - Token symbol: TFL - decimals: 8  (http://take.ms/0wvwQ   http://take.ms/eNz0e)  2.    Those paying with other coins, who had added an ETH wallet adress for withdrawal. In a few hours we'll provide you with the guidance on receiving TFLs through the smart contract.  3.    Those with a payment sent, but with no (or a wrong) ETH-wallet attached to their True Flip account. Instructions for tokens withdrawal will be provided within the next 2-3 days (or less).  So, please don't worry! You will definitely recieve everything, if not yet.  We keep on working to make True Flip the one best lottery on the planet!  Best regards, TrueFlip.io

Author: Mr.Charlie
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: TrueFlip.io Bitcoin lottery - concerns about their ICO! last month iawgom37 in trueflip As I've already commented in different post, the new Bitcoin Lottery site TrueFlip.io raises some concerns, so I'll repeat them:  has anyone managed to make a withdrawal? I've won something (total of 0.004), but simply can't find the withdrawal option anywhere? can't really find help file about withdrawals or at least information about if there are some conditions which must be met before you can withdraw. I've got some winnings by my referrals - and they don't show anywhere except in their stats, although it says that my referral winnings are on my balance. Certain red flags about this site:  Although it looks professionally designed and general idea is ok they're trying to collect a lot of money in ICO social accounts are totally empty and inactive they present themselves as a company, but can't seem to find any additional information... It sems that someone went through a lots of efforts to make this thing look really good, but it surely does raise some suspicion..doesn't it?  Not saying anything, I might be wrong and all this might be some kind of startup hiccups, but I just wanted to warn depositing players and potential investors that something doesn't look right, at least at this moment.  trueflip bitcoin lottery ico caution last month by iawgom37$0.21 9 votes Reply 10 293      Authors get paid when people like you upvote their post. Join our amazing community to comment and reward others. Sign up now to receive FREE STEEM! Sort Order:  trending [-]sini-o30  ¬∑  5 days ago I have just found site TrueFlip.io and after clicking on blog posts (that leads only back to the top of the page) I came here to steemit to check on the posts about TrueFlip. It was good to check, thank you. However, I have just searched the steemit site and True Flip has its own page. Any updates? $0.02 1 vote Reply ¬∑ [-]shushanigans26  ¬∑  3 days ago Yeah, would be great to hear updates, as their ICO is in a couple of days. Everything else except that situation with too many people trying to cheat the system, leading to blocking legit users, seems to be working. $0.00Reply [-]sabritoumi45  ¬∑  last month It looks fishy if you ask me , with all the things you said and i cant find any info as to who are on the team, for me that is a redflag,. but i dont know for sure, but i wouldnt jump on it if you ask me, maybe a little bit more reseacrch is needed. $0.00Reply [-]steemitboard54  ¬∑  last month Congratulations @iawgom! You have completed some achievement on Steemit and have been rewarded with new badge(s) :   You got a First Reply  Award for the number of upvotes received  Click on any badge to view your own Board of Honnor on SteemitBoard. For more information about SteemitBoard, click here  If you no longer want to receive notifications, reply to this comment with the word STOP  If you want to support the SteemitBoard project, your upvote for this notification is welcome! $0.001 vote Reply [-]trueflip47  ¬∑  last month Hello, we just opened up and have already seen a lot of scammers on the site, so algorithms were introduced to identify such people. You can write to the e-mail support@truflip.io and we will help to solve your problem. Now Withdrawal works;)  As for the rest of your questions, in the near future we are planning an announcement and opening of an official topic in the Bitcoinstall forum, where we will answer all questions, including yours. $0.00Reply ¬∑ [-]iawgom37  ¬∑  last month Aaaaand - an update on trueflip. They have banned my account (only the referral part) and sent me the following email:  Dear player, Your account was confirmed as 'cheater' and is blocked now. Sincerely, TrueFlip Team Last night my stats showed that more than 200 people clicked on my referral link, and 70 of them have confirmed their email address.  How I promoted their site:  I run few websites dedicated to Bitcoin gambling and I do updates both on those sites (where I published the trueflip article - only ONCE I also have a mailing list of more than 1500 users (not spam, they've registered themselves), where I also sent ONLY ONCE the trueflip story with my ref link The above mentioned articles have also been shared via social media So, as a reward for doing a legit promotion of their site, they openly call me a 'cheater'.  Another thing, before I started promoting them, I've signed up by their terms: which are still available on their website:  Get free tickets inviting your friends and colleagues, and get 2% of all friends' winnings (this reward is included in the marketing budget, so do not worry - True Flip will pay this money, not your friends). Just share your personal link for signing up of a new participant, and get a free ticket for each invited user that has played True Flip. 2% of all winnings including the Jackpot, will be transferred to your account with no time restriction! So, if some of your friends gets lucky to win in, to say, 2 years, you will still be able to get a pie of their winning! Oh, they said 'do not worry' and basically - a lifetime earnings. What happens when you bring them 70 players - they ban you for being a 'cheater'. Nice, really nice...  Also, the free tickets which you earn when you refer a player were initially a fully valid tickets. 9 days ago they've changed it - small wins which are most common - don't win any prizes at all, or really low ones, so they're not really a 'full valid' tickets.  Guys, I know you're new at this business, and I really like your site design - everyone sees that it took some real efforts to start this site. I also know that in this shitty Bitcoin world there are lots of scammers and cheaters, and you need to protect your business from those. But when you start treating legit supporters like this, you can say goodbye to your investment.  My first post where I say that something is fishy here - gets more and more valid with each similar action you take.  @trueflip - Get your shit together, and become a fully valid business, or continue with this behaviour and crash&burn - like thousands of others before you did... $0.002 votes Reply

Author: CrypThinkerton
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello Trueflip,  I'm a native German speaker and I want to give you feedback about the translation in the German subforum. It really is terrible. There are countless mistakes and it feels like Google translate was used. I think that leaves a bad impression on potential investors.  I'm also under the impression that this is the case for a lot of translations. Just want to throw it out there that it might be a wise idea to hire some kind of qualitycheck manager that is verifying whether the translations are legit. He could do so by knowing multiple languages himself or asking the subforum participants if they are satisfied with the translation. A simple poll in every subforum might do the trick as well.  Feel free to let me know if you want me to rewrite the German translation. I have the tools for this job.    CrypThinkerton

Author: FandangledGizmo
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: How often will there be a draw?  Most lotteries are once or twice a week? Once a week seems optimal till it gains more traction, no? (It seems that way the jackpots would be bigger & crypto media would cover the biggest once a week draw but a daily draw would not warrant constant media coverage unless somebody won.)  I see you have allocated +-20% to marketing. What percentage of ticket sales would you be able to offer the largest crypto exchanges? (If they had a portal to the largest crypto lottery via the exchange) That is where the largest pools of liquid crypto capital are & 10-20% might be very attractive to big exchanges who are making 0.25%.

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello, Bitboi1. You are right, and we have this bug found & fixed by now. The proper code is on GitHub (we try to publish the updates there as often as possible). All the following Draws will use the correct algorithm.  Also we decide to enable a permanent Bug Bounty program after the ICO. As you‚Äôre the first community member to blaze this trail, we are pleased to reward you with True Flip tokens ‚Äì just PM us for details!  We will give an extra free ticket to everyone, who had played for free using number 49 from the main list or number 26 from the Powerball list. Also 2 paid tickets are provided in compensation for each paid ticket which had played using 49/26 numbers. Frankly, these days our whole resources are used to conducting the ICO, so we‚Äôll do this in the nearest future.  As for the second issue, we‚Äôre aware and don‚Äôt consider this to be an issue in the present time. The code will be improved rapidly in case the hash starts shrinking. According to True Flip‚Äôs roadmap, we plan a massive refactoring with third-party consulting involved ‚Äì after the crowdsale ends, so we welcome you and everyone interested to help us improve the code.  Again, we are open for any feedback that the community members are ready to provide us with. We will definitely encourage all useful inputs with with rewards FandangledGizmo Frank37   Best regards, Trueflip.io

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Looking forward to your annoncement! It's time!   Best regards, Trueflip.io

Author: bitboi1
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hi, thanks for your response. Good to see you guys address it. However, I am still concerned why action would not be taken now to address the second issue. At present hash difficulty, the risk of duplicate draws crashing your algorithm is approx (4/49)^7 * 100 = .0000025%. Although very small, it is not safe!! Why risk this happening when it could be guaranteed correct with a few lines of code in only a few minutes? This probability is 100x more likely to occur than winning the jacket, ie, theoretically your algo will break 100 times before a jackpot is drawn. My opinion as a hopeful investor is that it does not instill confidence.

Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: We envisaged such a situation. Therefore, we are making 2 Jackpots. More details in the White Paper:  https://trueflip.io/TrueFlip%20Whitepaper(01.06).pdf  " Why do we still need to sell Tokens? Here are the main issues: 1. Jackpot. A lottery is interesting only if there is a BIG Jackpot. For a powerful launch we are planning to raise 1`960 BTC for Jackpot via Token Sale campaign. This value is achieved by multiplying: 40% * Total- SaleGoal * 80%, where 40% - is a share of funds assigned for Jackpot, TotalSaleGoal ‚Äì amount of money raised during the Token Sale and 80% - is the  rst part of the Jackpot. The Jackpot will be secured on cold wallets with use of multisignature escrow involving three community stakeholders, while the development team won‚Äôt have any access to this money. So when someone lucky wins the Jackpot, it will be transferred manually. 2. Second Jackpot. We understand that the probability of winning the Jackpot is 1:49`504`950. But the risk still exists, and we must ensure that we do everything we can to maximize the pro tability of our inves- tors. Therefore, we will have a second Jackpot, the size of 490 BTC, which corresponds to 20% of the funds assigned for the Jackpot. The calculation is as follows: 40% * TotalSaleGoal * 20%. It will also be stored on a cold wallet and use multisignature escrow involving three community stakeholders, but will only be used if the  rst Jackpot is won. Thus, we minimize the risk of losing interest to our lottery if during one of the  rst drawings the Jackpot will be won. " Best regards, Trueflip.io

Author: bitboi1
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hi,  As a potential investor, I am very concerned by what I have seen looking at your lottery algorithm. There are 2 glaring issues that undermine the legitimacy of your lottery and are astounding given the millions that will soon be raffled on the site.  1) Any customer who has purchased a ticket using number 49 has been cheated. Your algorithm uses modulo 49 which makes it so only numbers 1 through 48 are drawn. 2) Your algorithm discards repeated numbers and moves to the next 4 character section in the hash. This is inherently ok, but there are no safeguards to prevent a bitcoin block hash that generates duplicate powerball numbers exceeding the unique hash length. This may not happen for a long time, if ever, but there are already 18 prefix 0s on the bitcoin block hash, reducing your available seeds for the drawings, and this will only decrease in time. When it does hit, your algo will crash. For a lottery based business understanding the impact of ' small odds', this should go without saying..  https://github.com/TrueFlip/prizecounter/blob/master/algorithm.py  edit: 4 character, not 4 bit edit2: this also applies to the golden ball with modulo 26

Author: YIz
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Isn't this algo used only for seed generation?

Author: bitboi1
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Unfortunately not, but it is a poor choice of function naming. You can run today's hash through it to verify: 0000000000000000002ff9ee5ca24aa6c3248179a830b984c245c9390b0e165a gives [38,37,14,47,11,21], same as powerball numbers.

Author: YIz
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Weird, I'll wait for a response, maybe they are using an updated version of this algo or maybe it's just an early version.

Author: bitboi1
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: It says it was updated 10 days ago..Also, anybody can use the 'Check the transparency' feature on their website and enter a custom hash with a character 0x031 (49 in decimal), it does not result in the digit 49 being drawn. All of this is very surprising given the professionalism and software skill that went into the website.. but the money making algo looks to be an afterthought.

Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Yeah I see it too. are you sure 49 is supposed to be a possible number to be drawn? Join the telegram and ask to speak with the developers, if it's really an issue they might give you a bounty.

Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: I like the ICO so far, the only part that I question is the price to price to play vs the winning amount jackpot  Here is an example of what I mean;  Price per one True Flip lotto ticket is $2.75 or 0.001BTC Chances of winning 1 in 49,504,950 with a 39BTC Jackpot or $107,380.41  Price per one local store lotto ticket $1.00 Chances of winning 1 in 3,032,205 with a $500,000 Jackpot  Perhaps the Jackpot should be bigger to justify the cost of each ticket?

Author: Vasily Polynov
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hey guys, Check out TrueFlip's press-release below to get some raw data on the upcoming ICO:  TrueFlip blockchain lottery announces ICO starting June 28  Trueflip, the fair international blockchain lottery, is about to start crowdsale on June 28 at ico.trueflip.io. Trueflip aims to distribute 70% of it's TFL tokens priced 0,0005 BTC per 1 TFL.  The overall amount of the tokens issued is 21 000 000 and there will be no more issuance in the future. TrueFlip's goal is to obtain a total of up to BTC 6125.  The early bird bonus is determined the following: -   30% in TFL‚Äôs added to the received tokens during 0-1000 BTC stage -   20% during 1000-2000 BTC stage -   10% during 2000-3000 BTC stage -   5% during 3000-5000 BTC stage  At the end of the Token Sale the remaining unsold tokens will be burned and share of all Token holders will be proportionally increased, depending on the outstanding package.  The main targets of ICO are: -   forming of the largest ever online lottery Jackpot -   further decentralization and technical development according to the general strategy -   Extending the number of supported languages -   Raising funds for the promotional campaign among a wider audience  TFL‚Äôs provide their holders with the following opportunities: -   15% of each ticket sold are distributed daily with the holders, payments take place 4 times a year -   TFL will be listed on major exchanges (the exact platforms will be determined within 2 weeks following the ICO finish) -   The holders get ability to participate in making the key business decisions  20% of the general token amount is reserved for the Team: we get 20% of these at the end of the crowdsdale, 40% after achieving development KPI's and 40% in a year after the ICO.  Another 10% of tokens are allocated to finance the bounty company, escrow services and other related costs.  The obtained funds are protected in an escrow account that will be released in defined cases, described in the White Paper. The raised funds can only be accessed with the consent of at least two of the three signees and when all the conditions are met.  The lottery's Draw transparent code is released on Github.  TrueFlip resides in Costa Rica, where legislation allows online lotteries. The team is multinational.  ¬´One of the key differences with the TrueFlip project is the approach the team has taken. Often times, a crowdsale being offered means the investor will be waiting some period of time while the foundation of that platform is built. Trueflip decided to take a more forward-thinking approach and has a fully functional platform in use today. There has been substantial work performed by the TrueFlip team over the last year in preparation for the crowdsale, which should give a boost of confidence t investors who are looking for a polished offering opposed to simply a roadmap and a long development period to follow. Between the experience on the team itself, their pragmatic approach to under promising and over delivering and the fact that the World is ready for a provably fair, decentralized lottery, there is a lot to like about the TrueFlip platform. This is one of the many reasons I am happy to be an advisor to the project, they are doing things the right away to succeed in this industry"- said Jason Cassidy (Helium Pay, Securities Commission of Ontario), the member of TrueFlip's international advisors board.  You can learn more details about TrueFlip's business, its team and the White Paper on ico.trueflip.io. Also please visit trueflip.io to explore the lottery. Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello Anny_g  Our company is incorporated in Costa Rica and our project is legal there. As of the current moment, our lottery website is translated into 3 languages and the main language is English. That's why we have many people from Enlgish speaking countries, not just from the US. After we translate our website into 6 more languages, the traffic will be coming from the whole world. But this all is not related to the ICO. As you have read, US citizens are not allowed to take part in any kind of ICO. Therefore, if you look at the trafic statistics on the ico.trueflip.io page, there are only 7% percents of US visitors. Other trafic comes from other parts of the world. There are many Spanish speaking people. Therefore, we are doing translations into more languages. Regardless the fact that US citizens are not allowed to take part in the ICO, we are confident that more investors from the whole world will invest into our project.  Best regards, Trueflip.io

Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: True Flip ICO starts on 28 of June 2017   We invite you to join our bounty campaign! True Flip bounty fund consists of 630 000 True Flip Tokens.  The campaign ends on 26 of July 2017 or earlier in case of reaching the full cap. The stakes for all bounties will be counted every week. Each member's amount of True Flip Tokens will be calculated using the following formula: (Total amount of one bounty campaign Tokens /  Total amount of all of one bounty campaign participants' stakes)  *  Member's stakes   For example:  (252 000/6 000)*100 =4200 TFL     True Flip campaign token allocation:   Signature and avatar campaign bounty: 35% Translation and community management campaign bounty: 20% Facebook bounty: 15% Blog Posts, Articles and Videos bounty: 20% Twitter bounty: 10%    Signature and avatar campaign bounty: 35% 220 500 TFL  Bounty per week:   Hero and Legendary Members  4 stakes Senior Members 3 stakes Full Members 2 stakes Member and Jr. Member 1 stake   +0.5 stakes per week, if you use a True Flip's avatar + True Flip's personal text  True Flip's avatar  True Flip's personal text True Flip ICO: 28 of June 2017   You get a week stake if:   Use the signature during the week Make more than 5 high quality posts in a week Make each post at a different board  You don't get the week stake if:   You use multiple signatures at the same time You use an avatar from a different website along with a True Flip?s signature We found you spamming       Preferable sections for posts:   Gambling discussions Trading discussions Marketplace Local/same topics    Signature campaign instructions:   1. Add the True Flip's signature campaign bb-code matching your account rank to the Signature field of your Bitcointalk profile. Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hello, wgd! Yes, we have really received a warrant from the Russian web regulator Roskomnadzor stating that our lottery service breaks the Russian law as there‚Äôs a state monopoly on lotteries. The thing is that we actually don‚Äôt surpass any laws in Russia as Bitcoin‚Äôs still not considered as a currency, nor as a commodity by the countries law. Thus, we‚Äôve decided to restrict access of Russian-based IPs to our web-page. At the same time our legal team has sent an answer to this warrant explaining our position. Though still no feedback received from the authorities (they have 30 calendar days for it). Yet we consider our position strong and look forward to the further development of this dialogue up to a lawsuit against the state agency. Still we hope that a simple VPN can solve such problems for TrueFlip loyal users.

Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: True Flip ICO starts on 28 of June 2017   We invite you to join our bounty campaign! True Flip bounty fund consists of 630 000 True Flip Tokens.  The campaign ends on 26 of July 2017 or earlier in case of reaching the full cap. The stakes for all bounties will be counted every week. Each member's amount of True Flip Tokens will be calculated using the following formula: (Total amount of one bounty campaign Tokens /  Total amount of all of one bounty campaign participants' stakes)  *  Member's stakes   For example:  (252 000/6 000)*100 =4200 TFL     True Flip campaign token allocation:   Signature and avatar campaign bounty: 35% Translation and community management campaign bounty: 20% Facebook bounty: 15% Blog Posts, Articles and Videos bounty: 20% Twitter bounty: 10%    Signature and avatar campaign bounty: 35% 220 500 TFL  Bounty per week:   Hero and Legendary Members  4 stakes Senior Members 3 stakes Full Members 2 stakes Member and Jr. Member 1 stake   +0.5 stakes per week, if you use a True Flip‚Äôs avatar + True Flip‚Äôs personal text (signature)   You get a week stake if:   Use the signature during the week Make more than 5 high quality posts in a week Make each post at a different board  You don't get the week stake if:   You use multiple signatures at the same time You use an avatar from a different website along with a True Flip‚Äôs signature We found you spamming     Preferable sections for posts:   Gambling discussions Trading discussions Marketplace Local/same topics    Signature campaign instructions:   1. Add the True Flip‚Äôs signature campaign bb-code matching your account rank to the Signature field of your Bitcointalk profile.   <BB-codes coming soon>   2. Fill this form to participate in the True Flip‚Äôs signature bounty campaign:   Signature campaign sign up form https://goo.gl/K8X3Up   3. Check the status of your signature campaign application here:   Signature campaign participants list https://goo.gl/X41SnY   4. Make more than 5 high quality posts in a week at preferable sections.   Translation and community management campaign bounty:  20%  126 000 TFL  Bounty:   - True Flip ICO ANN thread opening post translation: 50 stakes - Activity in the local ANN thread: 5 stakes per 1 page in your ANN thread - Translation of the True Flip‚Äôs White Paper into your language: 50 stakes   You get stakes if:   You make True Flip‚Äôs ICO ANN thread opening post translation Your thread is active You make translation of the True Flip‚Äôs White Paper into your native language  You don‚Äôt get stakes if:   You use Google Translate and other online translators You do the translation into more than one language  Translation and community management instructions:   - Fill in this form to make a request for the participation in the Translation & Community management campaign: https://goo.gl/CmRwKP   - The translations / local community management reservations will be announced below in this post.    Blog Posts, Articles and Videos bounty: 20%   126 000 TFL  Bounty:   - A high quality publication about the True Flip ICO or the True Flip lottery available for anyone 10-100 stakes - A high quality video about True Flip ICO or True Flip lottery available to the Internet 10-100 stakes - A high quality publication about True Flip ICO or True Flip lottery for your email subscribers 10-100 stakes   You get stakes if:   Your publication or video is original Your publication or video is in English or your own language Your publication or video contains one or both of the following links https://ico.trueflip.io/, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1928663.0 or the #TrueFlip hashtag for Facebook pages  You don‚Äôt get stakes if:   Site or page, you‚Äôve made publication on is younger than two month or has no audience (less than 1000 followers) Your post is shorter than 10 words Your video is shorter than 20 seconds or longer than 5 minutes  Preferable channels/ web platforms for posts:   https://medium.com/ https://steemit.com https://www.reddit.com/  Publication or video creators receive 10, 20, 30‚Ä¶ 100 stakes depending on the quality of their posts, audience and channel. True Flip team makes the decision and this decision is final.   Translation and community management instructions: Fill in this blog participation form to let us know your details and also, to know the channels on which you are going to publish your text or video.   Participation form: https://goo.gl/ZQw6rE   We will check all the requests and if your publication is eligible - you will find yourself in this Blog Posts Articles and Video participants list (and later you will be able to check the number of stakes you've received):   Participants list: https://goo.gl/qJPos5     Facebook bounty:    15%  94 500 TFT  Bounty:   - Post, repost to the internet with your comment about TrueFlip ICO or TrueFlip lottery with  hashtags #TrueFlip, #lottery or  #TrueFlipICO 1 stake - Like&Follow page https://www.facebook.com/TrueFlip.io/ 1 stake - Facebook video post or live about TrueFlip ICO or TrueFlip lottery with hashtags  #TrueFlip, #lottery or  #TrueFlipICO 2 stakes - Repost to the internet with your comment TrueFlip‚Äôs posts 1 stake   You get stakes if:   Your post or video is original Your post  or video is in English or your own language Your publication or video has hashtags #TrueFlip, #lottery or #TrueFlipICO Your publication or video has link https://ico.trueflip.io  You don‚Äôt get  stakes if:   Your facebook account has less than 200 real followers You‚Äôve made less than 5 posts about True Flip till 19 of July 2017 You‚Äôve made reposts less than 5 True Flip‚Äôs posts till 19 of July 2017 (if there are 5 or more posts) You‚Äôve made repost without comment and hashtag  You have to post your posts and shares with your comment every week to bounty thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1928663.0   Last time to post report before counting is 19 of July 2017 23:00 UTC   Example of the Facebook campaign report text: Facebook url: *url of your Facebook account* Friends: *number of your Facebook friends* Followers: *number of your Facebook followers*   Posts: *links to your posts about True Flip*   Reposts: *links to your reposts the with your comment of True Flip page*   Video&Lives: *links to your video or live post about True Flip*   True Flip facebook bounty instructions: 1. Author: TrueFlip.io
Title: [ANN] TrueFlip - Become a part of the world's largest blockchain lottery +Bounty
Body: Hi puremage111,  We'll try to answer your questions here) As for now, only the governmental structure Roskomnadzor (Russian Federation) has warned us with a letter saying that we surpass the Russian law. So we decided to disable Russian IPs‚Äô access to our website. Now we are considering to file a lawsuit in response to the Russian regulator. About a minimal target amount for ICO, we will consider any result as acceptible because the crowdsale is not a vital matter for our business. At last you can see here in this topic our brand new bounty program in details. So, let's move forward! Thank you so much for your willing in help us to make TrueFlip better!  Best wishes, Trueflip.io

The Prize fund is divided among three places: - 30 000 TFL goes to the voting winner - 15 000 TFL ‚Äì the advisors‚Äô choice - 15 000 TFL ‚Äì the team‚Äôs choice  Also, we will give 3000 TFL to a random participant, commenting the contest's post.          Facebook bounty:    15%  94 500 TFT  Bounty:   - Post, repost to the internet with your comment about the TrueFlip ICO or the TrueFlip lottery with  hashtags #TrueFlip, #lottery or  #TrueFlipICO: 1 stake - Like&Follow page https://www.facebook.com/TrueFlip.io/: 1 stake - Facebook video post or live about TrueFlip ICO or TrueFlip lottery with the following hashtags  #TrueFlip, #lottery or  #TrueFlipICO: 2 stakes - Repost True Flip‚Äôs posts on the Internet with your comment: 1 stake   You get stakes if:   Your post or video is original Your post  or video is in English or your own language Your publication or video contains the #TrueFlip, #lottery or #TrueFlipICO Your publication or video contains the following link https://ico.trueflip.io  You don't get  stakes if:   Your facebook account has less than 200 real followers (friends are followers too) You've made less than 5 posts about True Flip till 27 of July 2017 You've made reposts less than 5 True Flip's posts till 27 of July 2017  You have to post your posts and shares with your comment every week to bounty thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1980698.   Deadline date for posting is July, 27 2017 23:00 UTC   Example of the Facebook campaign report text: Facebook url: *url of your Facebook account* Friends: *number of your Facebook friends* Followers: *number of your Facebook followers*   Posts: *links to your posts about True Flip*   Reposts: *links to your reposts the with your comment of True Flip page*   Video&Lives: *links to your video or live post about True Flip*   True Flip facebook bounty instructions: 1. Follow the official True Flip's page https://www.facebook.com/TrueFlip.io/   2. Use the True Flip facebook bounty campaign signup form to participate:   Facebook bounty campaign signup: https://goo.gl/1w6fuT     List of participants: https://goo.gl/4zQv25     Twitter bounty: 10%   63 000 TFL  Bounty:   - Post about the True Flip ICO or the True Flip lottery with  hashtags #TrueFlip, #lottery or  #TrueFlipICO 1 stake - Follow page https://twitter.com/TrueFlipLoto 1 stake - Retweet TrueFlip's tweet 1 stake     You get stakes if:   Your tweet is original Your tweet is in English or your own language Your tweet contains the #TrueFlip or #TrueFlipICO Your tweet contains the following link https://ico.trueflip.io/  You don't get stakes if:   You use on this bounty campagne more than one twitter account Your bitcointalk account is Newbie or Jr. Member Your twitter account has less than 300 followers You've made less than 5 tweets about True Flip till 27 July 2017 You've made less than 5 retweets from True Flip's account  till 27 July 2017  You have to post your tweets and retweets every week to bounty thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1980698.   Deadline date for posting is July, 27 2017 23:00 UTC   Example of the Twitter campaign report text: Twitter username: *your twitter account name* Twitter url: *url of your twitter account* Followers: *number of your followers*   Tweets: *links to your tweets about True Flip*   Retweets: *links to your retweets of the True Flip official account tweets*   True Flip twitter bounty instructions:   1. Follow the official True Flip‚Äôs account on twitter: https://twitter.com/TrueFlipLoto   2. Use the True Flip twitter bounty campaign signup form to participate:   Twitter bounty campaign signup: https://goo.gl/dqeKGH   List of participants https://goo.gl/PgyizB     Improvement bounty: 10%   63 000 TFL  Bounty:  - Fresh ideas for product improvement: interface, usability, more understandable things in playing process and so on. 10-200 stakes - Bug discovery: check the algorithm and every step in the game - find them out, that sad bugs. 10-1000 stakes - A high quality ideas about improvement Trueflip.io to more attractive and interesting game (we know that it is quite boring now). 10-500 stakes - Something useful else to make Trueflip.io the most interesting and attractive lottery. 10-500 stakes    You get stakes if:   Your idea landed to improvement roadmap Your bug landed to bug-fix or improvement roadmap  You don't get stakes if:   We got your idea or bug after they arrived at the improvement or bug-fix roadmap   Idea creators receive 10, 20, 30... 500 stakes depending on the quality and usefully of their ideas. True Flip team makes the decision and this decision is final.  Bug finders receive 10, 20, 30... 1000 stakes depending on importance of finding bug. True Flip team makes the decision and this decision is final.  All participants get same stakes for the same ideas and bugs till they landing to the improvement roadmap. After that nobody get stake for them.    Improvement bounty instructions: Create an idea, test the site or find the bug Write it in the letter to bounty@trueflip.io Fill in this blog participation form to let us know your details        Participation form: https://goo.gl/BuFz9T   We will check all the requests and if your ideas and bugs are eligible - you will find yourself in this Improvement participants list (and later you will be able to check the number of stakes you've received):   Participants list: https://goo.gl/U7Jwx2  Improvement and bug-fix roadmap: https://goo.gl/QVvUsz
